TypeSignature.Value: public struct Nullable<T> where T : struct
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Nullable`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic value class Nullable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 泛型类型的基础值类型。

span.span: The underlying value type of the generic type.

summary.span: 表示可分配有 的值类型。

span.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一种类型称为可为 null，如果它可以分配一个值，或者可以分配`null`，这意味着该类型有没有任何值。A type is said to be nullable if it can be assigned a value or can be assigned `null`, which means the type has no value whatsoever. 默认情况下，所有的引用类型，如，可以为 null，但所有值类型，如，不是。By default, all reference types, such as , are nullable, but all value types, such as , are not. 通过使用 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，在标记为可为 null 的值类型`?`后的值类型的表示法。In C# and Visual Basic, you mark a value type as nullable by using the `?` notation after the value type. 例如， `int?` C# 中或`Integer?`在 Visual Basic 中声明了整数值类型，可以分配`null`。For example, `int?` in C# or `Integer?` in Visual Basic declares an integer value type that can be assigned `null`. 结构为 null 的类型使用值类型，因为引用类型都可以为 null 的设计的支持。The structure supports using only a value type as a nullable type because reference types are nullable by design. 类提供了补充支持结构。The class provides complementary support for the structure. 类支持获取基础类型的为 null 的类型，并对其基础值类型可以为 null 的类型的比较和相等操作不支持泛型比较和相等运算。The class supports obtaining the underlying type of a nullable type, and comparison and equality operations on pairs of nullable types whose underlying value type does not support generic comparison and equality operations. ## 基本属性Fundamental Properties 两个基本成员结构是否和属性。The two fundamental members of the structure are the and properties. 如果属性对象是`true`，可以使用访问对象的值属性。If the property for a object is `true`, the value of the object can be accessed with the property. 如果属性是`false`，该对象的值是不确定并尝试访问属性，则会引发。If the property is `false`, the value of the object is undefined and an attempt to access the property throws an . ## 装箱和取消装箱Boxing and Unboxing 可以为 null 的类型进行装箱时，公共语言运行时自动框的基础值对象，而不对象本身。When a nullable type is boxed, the common language runtime automatically boxes the underlying value of the object, not the object itself. 也就是说，如果属性是`true`，内容属性进行装箱。That is, if the property is `true`, the contents of the property is boxed. 未装箱可以为 null 的类型的基础值时，公共语言运行时创建一个新结构初始化为基础的值。When the underlying value of a nullable type is unboxed, the common language runtime creates a new structure initialized to the underlying value. 如果`HasValue`属性为 null 的类型是`false`，装箱操作的结果是`null`。If the `HasValue` property of a nullable type is `false`, the result of a boxing operation is `null`. 因此，如果可以为 null 的装箱的类型传递给需要的对象参数的方法，该方法必须准备处理其中的参数是这种情况`null`。Consequently, if a boxed nullable type is passed to a method that expects an object argument, that method must be prepared to handle the case where the argument is `null`. 当`null`是未装箱到 null 的类型，公共语言运行时创建一个新结构并初始化其`HasValue`属性设置为`false`。When `null` is unboxed into a nullable type, the common language runtime creates a new structure and initializes its `HasValue` property to `false`. ## [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] 和 Windows 运行时组件and Windows Runtime Components 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]，可以包括类型作为结构导出 WinMD 库中的成员。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can include a type as a member of a structure exported in a WinMD library. 以前，这不是支持。Previously, this was not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义 Microsoft Pubs 示例数据库中表的三个行。The following code example defines three rows of a table in the Microsoft Pubs sample database. 该表包含两个不可为 null 的列和两个都可以为 null 的列。The table contains two columns that are not nullable and two columns that are nullable. [!code-cpp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cpp/tarow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cs/tarow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/vb/tarow.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回值，即使属性是`false`(不同于属性，将引发异常)。The method returns a value even if the property is `false` (unlike the property, which throws an exception). 如果属性是`false`，该方法将返回[默认](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table.md)的基础类型的值。If the property is `false`, the method returns the [default](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table.md) value of the underlying type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索的值对象如果该值是定义; 否则为它将检索默认值或特定的默认值。The following code example retrieves the value of a object if that value is defined; otherwise, it retrieves the default value or a specific default value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，当前的值对象可以通过访问属性。If the property is `true`, the value of the current object can be accessed with the property. 否则，尝试访问其值，则会引发异常。Otherwise, attempting to access its value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的属性`Nullable`(`Nullable(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 对象，以确定它是否应显示对象的属性或其属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此运算符支持当前的显式转换类型的实例`T`，类型。This operator supports the explicit conversion of the current instance to type `T`, the type of . 此类的显式转换的语法是依赖于语言的。The syntax for such explicit conversions is language-dependent. 您还可以通过调用执行转换方法。You may also be able to perform the conversion by calling the method. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is ## Examples 运算符，代码如下所示，将转换`Nullable(Of Int32)`值设为值。The operator enables code such as the following, which converts a `Nullable(Of Int32)` value to an value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`参数不是`null`，则新值初始化为`value`参数和属性初始化为`true`。If the `value` parameter is not `null`, the property of the new value is initialized to the `value` parameter and the property is initialized to `true`. 如果`value`参数是`null`，则新值初始化为默认值，该值是为所有二进制零的值，并且属性初始化为`false`.If the `value` parameter is `null`, the property of the new value is initialized to the default value, which is the value that is all binary zeroes, and the property is initialized to `false`. 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类型的值`T`尚未分配给对象，将其到进行比较`null`，并检索其属性，但您不能访问其属性或调用其他成员。If a value of type `T` has not been assigned to the object, you can compare it to `null` and retrieve its property, but you cannot access its property or call its other members. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的属性`Nullable`(`Nullable(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 对象，以确定它是否应显示对象的属性或其属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property.
